Unlike 1.6 and GO, Source is a game entirely made for fun. Not many competitive servers. Almost entirely all the current servers are about fun, not competitive game play. I really enjoyed this aspect and made a lot of friends. Also, once in a while there was some competition >:D . Furthermore, there isn't one server without at least one mod or custom map. A lot of community based creations which make the game 10 times better because it's made by one of your own. Not just a developer. Overall, You should purchase this if your in for a laugh or to make friends. But, if you are looking for a good competitive FPS I recommend the next installment of the Counter strike series CS:GO (Counter Strike: Global Offensive)

Ahh Counter Strike Source " l'ancêtre"  des FPS militaires est addictif avec un gameplay abordable et des cartes dont la popularité n'est plus à faire comme De Dust 2, militia ou Italy. Jouer en local peut être très divertissant tout comme mesurer son niveau à d'autres joueurs dans le multi peut faire progresser tout un chacun. Bref ce jeu depuis bientôt douze ans qu'il est sorti se porte toujours aussi bien avec une communauté qui ne désemplit pas au fil des années.

Идеальный вариант для тех,кому графика в 1.6 режет глаза,а GO по каким-то причинам не нравится.В Source,который вышел в 2004 года,неплохой движок с аналогичным названием,тоесть графон глаза резать не будет.Оружие в игре смотрится неплохо и неплохо ощущается,а для тех,кому надоело просто стрелять,есть сервера с другими режимами: Зомби,мини-игры,прыжки по картам и.т.д

I hate to admit this, but I, like most, bought this game just for the missing textures on Garry's Mod.  Yeah, I know, great way to start off a review, but I just had to.  Anyways, I got it while it was on sale and let it download.  But once it was finished, I wanted to see how it was, remembering it was made back in the 90's.  I loaded it up, created a server with some bots, and played.  Then I realized how AMAZING this game was considering when it was made.  I mean, this was a major step up in the video game industry.  Actually, it was pretty much the best game for a few years after it was made the way I see it.  I mean 1990's!  Sorry, I can't get over that.  Well, it's a great game, even for this generation.  I play it alot more than I thought I would too.  You should get this even if you don't have Garry's Mod.  But P.S., get it when it's on sale, makes the game look alot more appealing.

Bien que maintenant il soit assez difficile de trouver des parties dans le sens où il n'y en a que très peu aux heures de pointe, il n'en reste pas moins un jeu incroyablement bon et jouissif.

Counter-Strike: Source combines the award-winning original team shooter Counter-Strike 1.6 technologies engine Orange box. Counter-Strike: Source has updated graphics, realistic physics and a completely revamped sound, weapons, player models (which at the time in 2004), all of this and more awaits you in the game from the company Valve. Counter-Strike: Source simply must take a prominent place in the collection of every fan of the genre "Action".
